prod_short_desc: Build and drive the ultimate hyper car!
prod_long_desc:
Gear up for quad-turbocharged action with this buildable LEGO® Speed Champions version of one of the world’s most exclusive hyper cars—the Bugatti Chiron. This vehicle features wheels with rubber tires, a removable windshield plus iconic and realistic details. Test your driving skills with the three included marker cones. Includes a minifigure.
Includes a racing driver minifigure.
The race-ready, buildable Bugatti Chiron features a minifigure cockpit, wheels with rubber tires, removable windshield and iconic details.
Remove the windshield to place the minifigure in the car.
Also includes three marker cones.
Includes the racing driver’s helmet accessory element.
Role-play as a mechanic and champion racing driver.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 7+.
Bugatti Chiron measures over 1” high, 5” long and 1” wide.
